content.question: What are the rectangular coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses x comma y close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that give the location of the point with polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses r comma theta close parentheses equals open parentheses 2 comma negative fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma negative 1 half close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma 1 half close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative square root of 3 comma negative 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative square root of 3 comma 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative square root of 3 comma 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
